item.title: Freezing after die in funpk?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

alright, when you die in my funpk that i made… u get frozen… i dont have that coded ANYWHERE into my file tho…my funpk code is

   if ((absX >=3420 && absX <=3430 && absY >=2926 && absY <=2931 && IsDead == true && NewHP <= 1)) {
	NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); 
	setSkillLevel(3, getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]), 
	playerXP[playerHitpoints]);
	playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);                      
	teleportToX = 3281;            
	teleportToY = 2773;            
	sendMessage("Awww, you died in funpk, good thing u dont loose ur stuffs =]");
         }

is there a way to stop it from freezing you (its not the frozen from like an ice barrage or anything either ive checked all of that…)

Read full topic
